description: Made in Germany mens watches from Zeppelin convince with a perfect, masculin styling and the worldwide recognized Made in Germany quality! A good price-, performance ratio applys to the whole collection: The Zeppelin LZ126 Los Angeles Autom. 42 mm is an outstanding Mens wristwatch for extraordinary men. The straight forward designed dial in Blue shows Chronograph, Date, Minute, Second, Hour. Well crafted and strong is the Calf leather-bracelet in Brown color. Waterresistant to 5 ATM. The case diameter of 42 mm ensures jealous glances from your friends, colleagues and business partners. Order today your new dreamwatch from Zeppelin!

description: The Naos XS impresses with a slim case made out of polished 316L stainless steel and a case height of a mere 6 mm.  Just like its big brother, the Naos in 38 mm. The slim case of the Naos XS allows it to slide gently under any shirt or blouse sleeve. In addition to the classic silver version, it is also available in a sophisticated champagne gold tone.

description: The Orient Sun and Moon Skeleton AS0102S, also known as RA-AS0102S is not a simple timepiece. It’s an experience. As the brand’s best-seller, the contemporary design of the first versions is here swapped for a unique style, mixing apparent movement and day-night complication

description: The Omega Seamaster 'Edizione Venezia' was released in mid-2017 as a tribute to the 60th anniversary of the brand's Seahorse logo, which is inspired by those found on Venetian gondolas. The case, in either stainless steel or 'Sedna' gold, measures 39.5mm across and holds the self-winding, METAS-certified caliber 8800 /8801 movement. The domed dial features applied indexes, and time is indicated through a set of 'Feuille' hands.
specification: Diameter: 39.5 mm, Movement: Automatic, Self winding, Calibre: Omega caliber 8801, Power reserve: 55 hours, Functions: Hours, Minutes, Seconds,Chronometer, Co-Axial Escapement, Case Material: Sedna Gold, Strap color: Brown, Strap material: Leather

description: Perfectly balancing tradition and innovation, the Jazzmaster Open Heart offers a glimpse of its precision Swiss automatic movement in action. Using quality materials and featuring a range of dial and strap combinations, it's a collection that shows Hamilton at its best.

description: As a traditional watchmaking company, Longines has been producing exceptional timepieces since the very beginning. Today, the Longines Master Collection is the perfect illustration of this corporate ethos, as can be seen from the success enjoyed by this range since it was launched in 2005. All fitted with self-winding movements, the various models in this collection offer many special features. The Longines Master Collection brings together the classical elegance and excellent quality which never cease to delight those who appreciate exceptional timepieces.

description: Breitling Premier B01 Chronograph 42 Men's Watch AB0118371B1X2. This 42mm watch features a stainless steel case and bezel with an anthracite nubuck leather strap. The black dial has index hour markers with a date window displayed at 6 o'clock, a chronograph, and a tachymeter scale. It is powered by the Breitling Caliber 01 self-winding automatic COSC Chronometer certified movement with a 70-hour power reserve.

It features a solid-white case, an orange silicone strap with a multi-colored print, and a white dial with a multi-colored print of the master himself. The reverse side of the strap is inspired by his Aloha shirt. Comes in special packaging.

description: Classique wristwatch in 18-carat gold. Selfwinding extra-thin movement with date, power-reserve indicator and phases and age of the moon. Balance spring in silicon. Dial in gold, hand-engraved on a rose engine. Sapphire caseback. Water-resistant to 3 bar (30m). Diameter: 39 mm.Available in rose gold, in white gold and in yellow gold with different hand-engraved dials in gold, including a blue version on the white gold model.
specification: Diameter: 41 mm, Movement:  Automatic, Self-winding, Caliber: 502.3 DR1, Power reserve: 46 hours, Case Material: White gold, Strap material: Crocodile skin

description: The ZEITWERK is the first mechanical wristwatch that displays hours and minutes with jumping numerals. Its trailblazing design expresses the innovative concept. The time bridge is one of the most prominent design elements of its dial. It is part of the movement and constitutes the stage for all time indications.
specification: Diameter: 41.9 mm, Movement:  Automatic, Caliber: L043.1, Functions: Jumping hour, Power reserve: 36 hours, Crystal: Sapphire, Case Material: White gold, Strap material: Leather

description: Identical to 007's watch in No Time To Die, this 42mm Seamaster, in strong yet light grade 2 titanium, features a tropical brown aluminum bezel on the ring and caseback. Slightly slimmer than standard Diver 300M models thanks to the shape of the sapphire crystal, it is presented on a 2-level titanium braided strap with an innovative adjustable clasp. The Diver 007 Edition is powered by the OMEGA Co-Axial Master Chronometer 8806 movement, which has achieved the highest industry standards for precision, chronometric performance and of course magnetic resistance.
specification: Diameter: 42 mm, Movement:  Automatic, Case Material: Titanium, Strap material: Titanium / NATO

description: A new self-winding perpetual calendar has been added to the Patek Philippe collection. It comes in a Calatrava case with beautifully scalloped lugs and applied Breguet numerals. The yellow- and rosegold models feature ivory lacquered dials with recessed counters. The white-gold version has a blue sunburst dial. The watches come with a sapphire crystal case back and an interchangeable solid-gold back.
specification: Diameter: 39 mm, Movement: Self-winding, Caliber: 240 Q, Functions:  Day, date, month, leap year and 24-hour indication by hands.Moon phases, Power reserve: min. 38 hours - max. 48 hours, Dial: Ivory lacquered, gold applied Breguet numerals, Case Material: Rose gold, Strap material: Alligator strap with square scales, hand-stitched, shiny dark chestnut. Fold-over clasp.

description: Highlighting Patek Philippe’s great tradition of astronomical watches, the Celestial devotes its dial to a rotating chart of the heavenly bodies. At any time, its owner may admire the exact configuration of the nocturnal sky in the northern hemisphere, with the apparent movement of the stars and the phases and orbit of the moon. Two skeletonized hands point to the hours and minutes of mean solar time. An Ellipse, deposited on the underside of the sapphire glass, frames the portion of the sky visible from Geneva and all other cities located at the same latitude.
specification: Diameter: 44 mm, Movement:  Self-winding, Caliber: 240 LU CL C, Functions: Date by hand. Hours and minutes of mean solar time. Sky chart, phases and orbit of the Moon. Time of meridian passage of Sirius and of the moon, Power reserve: min. 38 hours - max. 48 hours, Dial: Three metalized sapphire-crystal discs as well as ellipse framing the portion of the sky visible from Geneva, Case Material: Platinum, Strap material: Alligator strap with square scales, hand-stitched, shiny navy blue. Fold-over clasp.

description: Stainless steel case with a 1stainless steel bracelet. Fixed stainless steel bezel. Black dial with luminous silver-tone hands and index hour markers. Arabic numeral minute markers (at 5 minute intervals). Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Day of the week and date display at the 3 o'clock position. Seiko caliber 7S26 automatic movement, based upon Seiko 7002, containing 21 Jewels, bitting at 21600 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 40 hours. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Pull / push crown. Transparent case back. Round case shape. Case size: 42 mm. Case thickness: 11 mm. Band width: 21 mm. Deployment clasp with a push button release. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: date, day, hour, minute, second. Seiko 5 Series. Casual watch style. Watch label: Japan Movt. Seiko 5 Automatic Black Dial Ladies Watch SNKP11J1.
specification: Diameter: 42 mm, Movement: Automatic, Caliber: Seiko Caliber 7S26, Power reserve: 40 hours, Functions: Date, Day, Hour, Minute, Second, Case Material: Stainless Steel, Strap material: Stainless Steel

description: Silver-tone stainless steel case and bracelet. Uni-directional rotating stainless steel bezel with a black ion-plated top ring. Dark blue dial with luminous arrow-shaped hands and index hour markers. Arabic numerals mark the 6, 9 and 12 o'clock positions. Minute markers. Rotating compass ring. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Day of the week and date display at the 3 o'clock position. Seiko Caliber 7S36 Automatic movement, containing 21 Jewels, bitting at 21600 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 40 hours. Scratch resistant Hardlex crystal. Screw down crown. Screw down case back. Round case shape, case size: 42 mm, case thickness: 13 mm. Band width: 22 mm. Fold over clasp with a safety release. Water resistant at 200 meters / 660 feet. description: With a 21-year background, Daniel Klein meets consumers in more than 80 different countries with the motto, “Fashion for Everyone”. In the series of Exclusive, Premium, DKLN, Smart Watch, D-Kids, D-Two and Trendy Daniel Klein attracts the attention of everyone with its special designs and unlimited colour options. It arouses millions of people’s interest around the world with special designs and accessible price policy as well as the functions sought for in a branded watch.
specification: Movement: Quartz, Case Material: Metal, Strap Material: Metal, Strap Color: Silver

description: Innovative in design, but still true to our DNA. Functional, aesthetic, and robust as well as high quality - without showing off. Large indexes ensure optimum readability. The outer bezel is reminiscent of outdoor measuring instruments. The double-domed sapphire crystal provides optimal scratch resistance, a clear view, and a sophisticated look. The chronograph-typical totalizers have been deliberately designed in a striking way. By pressing the pusher to trigger the stop function, seconds and minutes can be measured, while the chronograph second hand on the main dial measures the seconds during the stopping process. Available in white, black, and midnight blue.
specification: Diameter: 43 mm, Movement: Analogue quartz chronograph movement, Caliber: Miyota 0S21, Functions: Two hands, 24h-dial, 60 min-chronograph, seconds-chronograph, date, Dial: Midnight blue, Case Material: Stainless steel, Strap color: Brown, Strap material: Cattle leather
